content:encoded:
Yours Truly Johnny Dollar starts off this week’s Case Closed with The Jack Madigan Matter. That story aired October 21, 1950.

(30:40) For our second episode, The Adventures Of Philip Marlowe brings us Night Tide, his story from May 21, 1949.

Download CaseClosed702

Case Closed is made available for free thanks to your support. If you’re able to help, please visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
